Weather Alert/Monday hours
==========================

Due to inclement weather conditions, the city office will be closed Monday and will open Tuesday at 10am. Be safe and stay warm.

[Read more](https://cotullatx.civicpluswebopen.com/media/3476 "(opens in a new window)")
